author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...THE FLASH FLOOD THREAT FROM POST-TROPICAL CYCLONE CHANTAL HAS WANED...
summary: ...THE FLASH FLOOD THREAT FROM POST-TROPICAL CYCLONE CHANTAL HAS WANED... As of 11:00 PM EDT Mon Jul 07 the center of Chantal was located near 39.6, -73.6 with movement NE at 25 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1011 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 25 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...THE FLASH FLOOD THREAT FROM POST-TROPICAL CYCLONE CHANTAL HAS WANED... As of 11:00 PM EDT Mon Jul 07 the center of Chantal was located near 39.6, -73.6 with movement NE at 25 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1011 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 25 mph.

title: Summary - Post-Tropical Cyclone Chantal (AT3/AL032025)
